entry.title: Sines of Life 97: Figure 8 (Mellow Mix 2021)
entry.content:
Just in time for your Thanksgiving weekend at home or away comes this year‚Äôs Mellow Mix. Clocking in at 1 hour 45, Figure 8 is the perfect musical accompaniment to making your signature stuffing, or creating a backdrop for some pre-meal table chatter. Featuring all of our favorite artists that inspire those relaxed and cozy vibes for the holidays ‚Äì Massane, Shallou, Ben B√∂hmer, Marsh, Leaving Laurel, Dezza, OCULA, Jody Wisternoff, EMBRZ and too many more to name. Stitched in are familiar and emotive singles from Taylor Swift and Coldplay, weaving yet another a warming Winter soundtrack in the series.

With the arrival of our first baby daughter last month, I wasn‚Äôt sure where mixing would fit into the new world order, but I couldn‚Äôt miss the Mellow Mix, and it turns out she loves to hang out and dance with me while I work üíú she‚Äôs dope.

Turn it up, grab a warm ‚òï or a cold üç∫, and enjoy‚Ä¶


Get this mix.


Lifesine ¬∑ Sines of Life 97: Figure 8 (Mellow Mix 2021)

  1. Massane - Interlude (Original Mix)
  2. Douran - Passing Lights (Original Mix)

entry.title: Sines of Life 96: Chimaera
entry.content:
Fun and dynamic, with a winding journey through genres this mix. Big room trance from Ferry Corsten, Super8 & Tab, plus deeper sounds with MEDUZA‚Äôs new Ed Sheeran Remix of ‚ÄòBad Habits‚Äô and Nox Vahn‚Äôs stellar ‚ÄòOn My Way To Heaven‚Äô Remix. Stir in some Satin Jackets, Purple Disco Machine, and SG Lewis for those Disco Electronic vibes, and some mellower Ben B√∂hmer and Tagavaka ‚Äì all amounting to quite the chimaeric cocktail if you will.

Enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶


Get this mix.


Lifesine ¬∑ Sines of Life 96: Chimaera

  1. Falden - Don‚Äôt Wanna Know (Le Youth Remix)

entry.title: Sines of Life 95: Blacklight Love
entry.content:
Loads of new music this week, debuting the talented lady-duo Gioli & Assia to the show, plus a new bona fide earworm from gardenstate - ‚ÄòThe Best Part‚Äô. A surprise even to me, I managed to sneak in something rather uncharacteristic with ‚ÄòDon‚Äôt Let Me Be Misunderstood‚Äô by Santa Esmerelda ‚Äì but just try and tell me it doesn‚Äôt work üòÇ

A Back2BackTrack in today‚Äôs mix, with the MEDUZA Remix of R Plus feat. Dido ‚ÄòMy Boy‚Äô, right into Marsh‚Äôs ‚ÄòLittle Darling‚Äô from the mix before last.

Enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶


Get this mix.

entry.title: Sines of Life 94: Arcane Automaton
entry.content:
This was a really fun mix to put together ‚Äì as it was developing, I started forming a little narrative around it, and proceeded to let that shape the rest of the mix, leaning in further. Alas, I inevitably sacrificed a bit of untold-story for a better overall mix, but if you listen carefully there‚Äôs still an intriguing love triangle unfolding in Arcane Automaton.

Lots of great electro-robotic sounds & synths in this one, with just a touch of emotion to elucidate our Automaton‚Äôs more human side. Featuring two tracks from newcomer Hidden Face, both off his recent ‚ÄòNeed U‚Äô EP ‚Äì his sound is just so perfect for this mix, I had to double-dip. That, plus two each from mainstays Sultan + Shepard, Ben B√∂hmer, and Tinlicker make for quite a show here.

As always, turn it up‚Ä¶


Get this mix.

  2. Luttrell - No Pressure

entry.title: Sines of Life 93: Thumper
entry.content:
A mix guaranteed to get your blood pumping and your hearth thumping. Opening up with new music from the ever-trendy Kaskade, the Ti√´sto Remix of Ben Platt‚Äôs new single, plus an impeccable collaboration from Sultan + Sheperd and Le Youth.

Our BackTrack this mix is ‚ÄòBeautiful Creatures‚Äô by Illenium, which lends beautifully to the drop-in to Eli & Fur‚Äôs ‚ÄòSomebody Else‚Äô Remix by Tensnake.

Enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶


Get this mix.

entry.title: Sines of Life 92: Frequency Shifter
entry.content:
I‚Äôve got a great show for you folks, with plenty of brand new music coming out from favorites Ben B√∂hmer, Marsh, Jordin Post, and Lane 8, who is celebrating his This Never Happened label‚Äôs ‚ÄúV‚Äù year Anniversary ‚Äì got to love all the incredible talent he‚Äôs cultivated over the last half decade, who all regularly grace this show.

Included as well, not one, but two tracks from Fatum‚Äôs recent EP, ‚ÄòSymphotek‚Äô and ‚ÄòMake It Rain‚Äô add some very distinct flavors, and certainly help shape the vibe-changes throughout Frequency Shifter.

Enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶

entry.title: Sines of Life 91: Fins Up, Baby

link.title: Sines of Life 91: Fins Up, Baby

entry.content:
A last minute project to get BBQ-ready for this year‚Äôs 4th, but don‚Äôt let the quick turnaround fool you ‚Äì this Summery set is packed with all the funky, poppy bangers that‚Äôll have you Fins Up before you know it. In this mix, the new single from John Mayer, lot‚Äôs of vocal fun from Becky Hill, some sparkly Sigala, and a trio of tracks from the Summer vibe-maker SG Lewis.

BackTrack in this set is the poolside staple ‚ÄòCola‚Äô from CamelPhat, the Robin Schulz Remix.

So fire up the barbecue, enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶


Get this mix.

entry.title: Sines of Life 90: Astral Highway
entry.content:
Lots of new music coming out right now, from the likes of Joseph Ray, Nox Vahn, Durante, Tinlicker, and more. Of special note, the new three track EP from Jordin Post ‚Äì taking a break from his Juventa alias ‚Äì is near as flawless as they come. This mix we feature ‚ÄòBlossom‚Äô from that release, and I‚Äôll be following up with the titular ‚ÄòAzure‚Äô next month as well.

Gracing our ears once more, this month‚Äôs BackTrack is Disco Fries with ‚ÄòMoving On‚Äô. It‚Äôs fun, it fits, and it got me where I needed to go üòâ

As always ‚Äì Turn it up‚Ä¶

entry.title: Sines of Life 89: Never Really Goodbye

link.title: Sines of Life 89: Never Really Goodbye

entry.content:
Fun and catchy tracks abound this month, with some wonderful motion and progression in the mix. Dezza, GVN, Sunny Lax, The Dualz, Enamour, and many more grace this delightful end-of-May session.

All that is tempered however by the tragic news last month of Pierce Fulton‚Äôs passing. Listening back through his work, there are too many good track to count, from the indefatigable positivity of Kuaga and Life in Letters to his more evocative and asyncopated collaboration as Leaving Laurel, his music helped define the latest generation of dance music. So, we end this month‚Äôs mix with a 15-minute Pierce Fulton mini-mix, knowing he will be truly, sorely missed, but that as long as we still have a person‚Äôs music, it‚Äôs Never Really Goodbye.

Turn it up‚Ä¶


Get this mix.

entry.title: Sines of Life 88: Still Life Reanimated

link.title: Sines of Life 88: Still Life Reanimated

entry.content:
A meandering and eclectic mix this time around, with fresh goodness from Sultan + Shepard, Sunny Lax, and ALPHA 9, plus some rather old school goodness from Ferry Corsten.

More than a few BackTracks being featured this month, as I found myself wandering through that tough mid-tempo range trying to creep back in sight of 120bpm or so. Thanks to that, we revisit tracks from Chet Porter, Ellie Goulding, 3LAU, and the very sci-fi ‚ÄòSystem Override‚Äô by Makeup and Vanity Set.

Enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶


Get this mix.
